MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Cellular respiration | d: Mitosis

MCQ: Which level of organization in biology studies the anatomy and physiology of plants and animals?
Choices: a: Molecular biology | b: Cell biology | c: Organismal biology | d: Population biology

MCQ: When did life on Earth emerge?
Choices: a: 1 billion years ago | b: 2.5 billion years ago | c: 3.7 billion years ago | d: 5 billion years ago

MCQ: Which organisms contribute to the biodiversity of an ecosystem?
Choices: a: Archaea and Bacteria | b: Protists, Fungi, and Plants | c: Animals | d: All of the above
